traits.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
